mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, IDX, BOARD_CODE, CATEGORYS, TITLE, WRITER, PASSWD, EMAIL, CONTENT, REMOTE_ADDR, to_char(CREATE_TIME,'yyyy/MM/DD') CREATE_TIME, to_char(UPDATE_TIME,'yyyy/MM/DD') UPDATE_TIME, IS_NOTICE, LIKECNT, BADCNT, IS_COMMENT, IS_REPLY, IS_PRIVATE, SEQ, LEVELS, STEP, FILECNT, HITS, MEMBER_SEQ, IS_DEL, URL from ( select * from board order by seq desc, step asc)) where rnum >= #{startrow} and rnum <= #{endrow} order by is_notice
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( IDX,BOARD_CODE,CATEGORYS,TITLE,WRITER,PASSWD, EMAIL,CONTENT,REMOTE_ADDR,IS_NOTICE, MEMBER_SEQ ,URL,SEQ) VALUES ( baord_seq.nextval , #{board_code} , #{categorys}, #{title}, #{writer}, #{passwd} , #{email}, #{content} , #{remote_addr}, #{is_notice}, #{member_seq}, #{url} ,baord_seq.CURRVAL )

INSERT INTO BOARD ( IDX,BOARD_CODE,CATEGORYS,TITLE,WRITER,PASSWD, EMAIL,CONTENT,REMOTE_ADDR,IS_NOTICE, MEMBER_SEQ ,URL,SEQ,LEVELS,STEP) VALUES ( baord_seq.nextval , #{board_code} , #{categorys}, #{title}, #{writer}, #{passwd} , #{email}, #{content} , #{remote_addr}, #{is_notice}, #{member_seq}, #{url},#{seq},#{levels}+1,#{step}+1 )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET CATEGORYS = #{categorys}, TITLE = #{title}, WRITER = #{writer}, EMAIL = #{email}, CONTENT = #{content}, REMOTE_ADDR = #{remote_addr}, UPDATE_TIME = sysdate, IS_NOTICE = #{is_notice}, URL = #{url} WHERE idx=#{idx}
update board set step=#{step} +1 where seq=#{seq} and step > #{step}
